author: fitz
msg: (Commit.__init__): Factor out the commondir code into its own
function so that we can reuse it in Lock.__init__.

author: dlr
msg: Vote for r14180.  It would be nice if there was a constant
representing "no expiration date" (an apr_time_t of 0), but this
could be introduced in a later release.
